description technical detail:
NEC MultiSync V801 - 80" Commercial-Grade Large-Screen LCD Display
NEC's 80" V801 commercial-grade large-screen LCD display is ideal for applications requiring considerable screen size such as education facilities, coporate lobbies, board rooms, and retail. This display utilizes LED-backlighting to deliver a slim depth and low power consumption while a full high-definition panel delivers brilliant imagery.
features: Ambient light sensor (ALS), screen saver, fanless cooling system, Scheduler Function (with RTC), TileMatrix (10 x 10), Eco Mode, Open Pluggable Specification slot, DICOM Simulated Gamma
